Package robot

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Calibration
    This class contains all of the robot's calibration routines
    NxtCommand
    This class implements a connection to the NXT application.
    NxtMotor  
    NxtSensor  
    Robot
    Implements simple API for cube manipulation on NXT2.0
    Robot.Arm
    Arm Class Represents the motor responsible for holding and flipping the cube
    Robot.ColorDetector
    ColorDetector Class Represents the color detector unit, both motor and sensor
    Robot.ProximitySensor
    This class represents the proximity sensor unit
    Robot.Tray
    Tray Class Represents the motor which controls the cube tray
    Tests
    Tests Class This class contains all the robot's tests
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Colors  
    Direction  
    FlipMethod
    Represents the flip operation, SINGLE for one flip, DOUBLE for two and NONE for no operation

    Represents the Color Sensor location,
